EmailTemplate.name: ZeroDocsTemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.clq_recordtypename__c} , {!CLQ_Program_Transaction__c.Name} Submitted without Documents
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The program {!CLQ_Program__c.CLQ_Program_Number__c}, {!CLQ_Program__c.Name} has been Updated. The list of information that has been updated are
Name {!CLQ_Facility_Schedule__c.CLQ_Days_of_Operation__c}
Contact the Child Care Help Desk for additional assistance at 1-877-302-2347. The Ohio Child Licensing and Quality System Team. This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain private, confidential, and/or privileged information. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure, or distribution is prohibited
